data.text:
LEONA Lewis is well known in the music business thanks to his incredible career as a singer and actress.

In August 2022 it was revealed that Leona and husband Dennis Jauch had welcomed their first child together.

Who is Leona Lewis' husband?

Like his wife, Dennis Jauch also has a career in the entertainment industry but as a producer and choreographer.

He is also the co-founder of No Ceilings Entertainment and Coffee + Plants, a plant-based coffee shop in Los Angeles.

"I rescue animals & get paid to create epic s**t üöÄüôáüèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è," Jauch's Instagram bio reads.

When he is not in the office, he often posts pictures about his life to his 40K followers.

When did Leona and Dennis have their baby?

On March 23, 2022, Lewis revealed that she is pregnant on Instagram with a photo that reveals her baby bump.

"Can't wait to meet you in the Summer ‚ù§Ô∏è," she captioned the post.

Jauch later posted the same picture on his Instagram page with the caption, "Biggest gift I could've asked for coming this Summer ‚ù§Ô∏è You're one hot a** Mama @leonalewis."

On August 2, 2022 Leona revealed she had given birth to a daughter.

Along with a cute snap she wrote on Instagram: "And then there were three. Our little Carmel Allegra arrived 22.7.22."

How did Leona and Dennis meet?

Lewis and Jauch tied the knot in 2019 during a beautiful ceremony in Tuscany, Italy.

Prior to their relationship, the two met in 2010, when Jauch was performing as a backup singer on Lewis' tour, People reports.

They later started a relationship and got engaged eight years later.

"It's amazing that we were brought together from different sides of the world through both of our passions, music and dance, whilst on tour in the U.K. eight years ago," Lewis told People at the time.

"We are both quite private people, but we wanted to share our happy news with everyone that has supported us and watched our relationship blossom over the years.

"We are so thrilled to be on this new adventure together and it is a beautiful feeling to share that love with you all," she continued.
